= How to Use the GWT Incubator =

Using the GWT incubator widgets and libraries is as simple as following the four steps below. Give them a try and your project should be ready to roll with the GWT incubator.

 # Get the incubator jar:
   * Download [http://google-web-toolkit-incubator.googlecode.com/files/gwt-incubator.jar].
   * Follow the instructions in MakingIncubatorBetter to create your own incubator.jar.
 # Add the incubator.jar to your project's classpath.
 # Add the following lines to your module file:
{{{	
   <inherits name='com.google.gwt.widgetideas.WidgetIdeas' />	
   <inherits name='com.google.gwt.widgetideas.LibIdeas' />
}}}
 # Report bugs and enhancement requests  [http://code.google.com/p/google-web-toolkit-incubator/issues/entry here].

Have fun!
